column2:
"Huh? The request I accepted? Yeah, don't worry
about it."

"I work at my own pace and I make my own rules.
Everyone who places a request with me knows that.
It's part of the deal."

"Anyway, come on, let's go to the Tundra.
It's a pretty tough place, and there's no
shortage of ARKS members who go missing there. "

"A little search and rescue is actually one of the
requests I've got on my plate, so we'll be killing
two birds with one stone."
